episode.title: East Carroll Parish School Board v. Marshall

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgment and opinion of the Court in 73-861, East Carroll Parish School Board and the Police Jury against Marshall and for reasons stated in an opinion of the Court filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit is affirmed.
